Title: Windows 8 App Design Reference Template: Block Style Picture
Description: Block Style Pic template is an emulation of a data storage app with placeholders for category and details data.
HomeWiki:
Disclaimer: The template provided in the form of Visual Studio project (C# and JS) is meant to act as a starter kit for Windows 8 Store apps development. You are recommended to change or modify the look and feel to suit the branding that is required for your app. The template by no means restricts you to stick to the layout, navigation or other aspects indicated.

Project Description

Block Style Pic template is an emulation of a data storage app with placeholders for category and details data. Please refer to the "snapshots" folder under the root template folder to get a glimpse of the template look and feel. You can leverage this style if your implementation scenario is closest to this template.

Download includes the following

  • Source (C# and JS)
  • Package
  • Snapshots
  • Documentation
